Description: Fragment of flattened handle of a pottery transport amphora from neck join to moderate turn. Clay medium ginger-buff; grey core; white inclusions and some mica. Oval stamp.
Curator's comments: Trimmed. The clay suggests a possible origin from Cyrenaica.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1675)
